Name: MADHACK
About the game: Come and help Mad collect the Orbs and get back to his home. MADHACK is a 2D platform game in Retro style, with stages created by hand, with precise controls and that provides fun for all types of players. A fun and relaxed adventure for all types of players, who like platform games. More than 18 levels for the player to explore and discover all possible paths between each level. A good challenge for Speedrunners (the game has a native timer).
